update t_iot_device
server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dev_type = #{devType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_iot_device set server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dev_type = #{devType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dev_serial = #{devSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connect_point_id = #{connectPointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_mode = #{serviceMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_published = #{isPublished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `location` = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, end_user_info = #{endUserInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_user_name = #{endUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_name = #{industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_icon_id = #{displayIconId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protocol_type = #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_sim_Card = #{hasSimCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sim_num = #{simNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, extend_type = #{extendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_manager = #{createManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_manager = #{updateManager,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select d.id, d.server_id as serverId, d.dev_type as devType, d.dev_serial as devSerial, d.`name`, d.connect_point_id as connectPointId, d.service_mode as serviceMode, d.is_published as isPublished, d.`location`, d.longitude, d.latitude, d.end_user_info as endUserInfo, d.end_user_name as endUserName, d.industry_name as industryName, d.category_name as categoryName, d.display_icon_id as displayIconId, d.client_id as clientId, d.protocol_type as protocolType, d.has_sim_Card as hasSimCard, d.sim_num as simNum, d.del_flag as delFlag, d.extend_type as extendType, d.create_time as createTime, d.create_manager as createManager, d.update_time as updateTime, d.update_manager as updateManager, ifnull(de.alarm_status, 0) as alarmStatus, de.alarm_desc as alarmDesc, de.alarm_time as alarmTime from t_iot_device d left join t_iot_device_ext de on de.device_id = d.id where 1=1 and d.del_flag=0
order by d.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from t_iot_device d left join t_iot_device_ext de on de.device_id = d.id where 1=1 and d.del_flag=0
